segments.text: I love watching these kids sneak cookies like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on the stool, stretching up to the jar, so determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's waiting patiently with her hand out, what a team.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're having such a fun adventure without mom knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is full, looks delicious even from here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is busy with dishes, giving them the perfect chance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's overflowing from the sink, but hey, adds to the excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the puddle, but she's oblivious, which is hilarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks nice, but inside is where the real fun is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get a few cookies before she turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool wobbles a bit, but they'll manage, I bet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene just makes me smile thinking about childhood mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacked dishes on the counter look ready for more family time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a joyful little moment captured here.
segments.speaker: PAR
